title: On the Wing
description: What Matica has dreamed of ever since she first befriended the condors has actually happened in the last chapter of the previous book, Talon, Come Fly With Me. Now the adventure continues. Finally accepting Matica into their community with that incredible event, the Indians of Peru love seeing her together with Talon and his parents, Tamo and Tima. Now she has to tell all of her adventures with her condors in class. Only her mother wasn't very impressed with that event, but she finally is turning around as well and loves seeing them together in that intimate way. Her mother first saw danger in it but after Matica showed her how safe she is with Talon, her mother gave her the go ahead.
author: Gigi Sedlmayer
